title: Election of President.
text:
The President shall be elected by the members of an electoral college consisting of—

  • (a) the elected members of both Houses of Parliament; and
  • (b) the elected members of the Legislative Assemblies of the States.

70[Explanation.—In this article and in article 55, “State” includes the National Capital Territory of Delhi and the Union territory of *Puducherry.]

amendments.description: 'State' inclds NCT of Delhi & UT of Puducherry
